mapper.select: /* 가맹점 목록 */ SELECT branch_code AS branchCode, member_id AS memberId, branch_name AS branchName FROM branch_management;
mapper.update:
/* 특정코드로 객실 수정*/ UPDATE room_information
room_name=#{roomName},
room_size=#{roomSize},
room_basic_personnel=#{roomBasicPersonnel},
room_max_personnel=#{roomMaxPersonnel},
available_dog_types=#{availableDogTypes},
room_basic_price=#{roomBasicPrice},
WHERE room_code=#{roomCode};
mapper.select: /* 특정 코드로 객실 조회*/ SELECT ri.room_code, ri.registrant_id, ri.branch_name, ri.room_name, ri.room_size, ri.room_basic_personnel, ri.room_max_personnel, ri.available_dog_types, ri.room_basic_price, ri.room_registration_date FROM room_information AS ri WHERE ri.room_code = #{roomCode};
mapper.insert:
/* room code 자동증가 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(ri.room_code) = 0 THEN 'room_code_1' ELSE CONCAT('room_code_',(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(ri.room_code,'room_code_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1)) END AS roomCode FROM room_information AS ri
/* 객실등록 */ INSERT INTO room_information (room_code, branch_code, registrant_id, room_name, room_size, room_basic_personnel, room_max_personnel, available_dog_types, room_basic_price, room_registration_date) VALUES (#{roomCode}, #{branchCode}, #{registrantId}, #{roomName}, #{roomSize}, #{roomBasicPersonnel}, #{roomMaxPersonnel}, #{availableDogTypes}, #{roomBasicPrice}, CURDATE())
mapper.select:
/*조건 검색*/ SELECT ri.room_code, ri.branch_code, ri.registrant_id, bm.branch_name, ri.room_name, ri.room_size, ri.room_basic_personnel, ri.room_max_personnel, ri.available_dog_types, ri.room_basic_price, ri.room_registration_date FROM room_information AS ri INNER JOIN branch_management AS bm ON ri.branch_code = bm.branch_code
